title: runtime: non-atomic pointer writes in memmove/memclr on arm64
body:
Full output here: http://paste.ubuntu.com/12319496/

I've had this happen on an ubuntu builder (with the 1.5 release) and with tip as of 5cbca8d84ba4625893c3a0b28a279d664b4125ec

Seems to happen roughly every other time.
